channel.title: Osmotic Stress on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Osmotic Stress on funPlantGenes

item.title: BnHO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnHO1 Gene Name: heme oxygenase 1 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnHO1, a haem oxygenase-1 gene from Brassica napus, is required for salinity and osmotic stress-induced lateral root formation.

item.title: BpNAC012
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BpNAC012 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor Genome: Species: Betula platyphylla Functional Descriptions: Gain- and loss-of-function analyses revealed that the transcript level of BpNAC012 was positively associated with salt and osmotic stress tolerance.

item.title: CaHDZ12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaHDZ12 Gene Name: Homeodomain-Leucine Zipper (HD-Zip) I Transcription Factor12 Genome: Species: Cicer arietinum Functional Descriptions: Chickpea WRKY70 Regulates the Expression of a Homeodomain-Leucine Zipper (HD-Zip) I Transcription Factor CaHDZ12, which Confers Abiotic Stress Tolerance in Transgenic Tobacco and Chickpea.

item.title: CaSAP14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA10g19590 Gene Symbol: CaSAP14 Gene Name: Pepper stress-associated protein 14 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Pepper stress-associated protein 14 (CaSAP14) is a substrate of CaSnRK2.

item.title: CaSnRK2.6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA08g17680 Gene Symbol: CaSnRK2.6 Gene Name: SNF1-related kinase 2.

item.title: FsPTP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FsPTP1 Gene Name: protein tyrosine phosphatase1 Genome: Species: Fagus sylvatica Functional Descriptions: Functional analysis in Arabidopsis of FsPTP1, a tyrosine phosphatase from beechnuts, reveals its role as a negative regulator of ABA signaling and seed dormancy and suggests its involvement in ethylene signaling modulation.

item.title: GmDREB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmDREB1 Gene Name: dehydration responsive element binding protein Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of GmDREB1 improves salt tolerance in transgenic wheat and leaf protein response to high salinity.

item.title: GmERF75
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10G016500 Gene Symbol: GmERF75 Gene Name: Ethylene-responsive factor gene 75 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The ABA-induced soybean ERF transcription factor gene GmERF75 plays a role in enhancing osmotic stress tolerance in Arabidopsis and soybean.

item.title: GmGPDH12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmGPDH12 Gene Name: glycerol-3-phosphate dehydrogenase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmGPDH12, a mitochondrial FAD-GPDH from soybean, increases salt and osmotic stress resistance by modulating redox state and respiration.

item.title: GmNAC6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmNAC6 Gene Name: NAC domain protein NAC6 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The NAC domain-containing protein, GmNAC6, is a downstream component of the ER stress- and osmotic stress-induced NRP-mediated cell-death signaling pathway.

item.title: GmWNK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmWNK1 Gene Name: WNK kinase homolog1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The soybean root-specific protein kinase GmWNK1 regulates stress-responsive ABA signaling on the root system architecture.

item.title: Gshdz4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Gshdz4 Gene Name: transcription factor hdz4 Genome: Species: Glycine soja Functional Descriptions: A novel Glycine soja homeodomain-leucine zipper (HD-Zip) I gene, Gshdz4, positively regulates bicarbonate tolerance and responds to osmotic stress in Arabidopsis.

item.title: IbLEA14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbLEA14 Gene Name: Late embryogenesis abundant 14 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: Sweetpotato late embryogenesis abundant 14 (IbLEA14) gene influences lignification and increases osmotic- and salt stress-tolerance of transgenic calli.

item.title: MaPIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MaPIP1|1 Gene Name: PIP1 subfamily AQP Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: A banana aquaporin gene, MaPIP1|1|MaPIP1|1, is involved in tolerance to drought and salt stresses.

item.title: MdMYB46
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD03G1176000 Gene Symbol: MdMYB46 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdMYB5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD11G1006500 Gene Symbol: MdMYB5 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdSAT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSAT1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple MdSAT1 encodes a bHLHm1 transcription factor involved in salinity and drought responses.

item.title: MdSND1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD06G1121400 Gene Symbol: MdSND1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Dual role of MdSND1 in the biosynthesis of lignin and in signal transduction in response to salt and osmotic stress in apple.

item.title: MsFLS13
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MsFLS13 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago sativa Functional Descriptions: Our findings highlight the crucial role of MsFLS13 in alfalfa in response to saline-alkali stress and provide a novel genetic resource for creating saline-alkali-resistant alfalfa through genetic engineering.

item.title: MsNAC022
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD10G1198400 Gene Symbol: MsNAC022 Gene Name: Genome: Sosaceae website (https://www.

item.title: nuRIP;OsjRIP11.2
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os11g06460 RAPdb gene ID: Os11g0164000 Gene Symbol: nuRIP OsjRIP11.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g01430 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0104200 Gene Symbol: OsNAC016 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g44540 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0647600 Gene Symbol: OsNF-YA3 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsOSCA1.2
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os05g51630 RAPdb gene ID: Os05g0594700 Gene Symbol: OsOSCA1.

item.title: OSPGYRP
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os07g39680 RAPdb gene ID: Os07g0585500 Gene Symbol: OSPGYRP Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsPIE3;OsPUB16
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g66130 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0884400 Gene Symbol: OsPIE3 OsPUB16 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsPP2C09;OsPP15
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g62760 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0846300 Gene Symbol: OsPP2C09 OsPP15 OsPYL2 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsPP65
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os04g37660 RAPdb gene ID: Os04g0449400 Gene Symbol: OsPP65 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsRLCK241
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os07g48730 RAPdb gene ID: Os07g0686800 Gene Symbol: OsRLCK241 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: PsGRP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsGRP1 Gene Name: putative glycine rich protein precursor Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: Expression of PsGRP1, a novel glycine rich protein gene of Pisum sativum, is induced in developing fruit and seed and by ABA in pistil and root.

item.title: PtoERF15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.008G166100 Gene Symbol: PtoERF15 Gene Name: ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR 15 Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: The AP2/ERF transcription factor PtoERF15 confers drought tolerance via JA-mediated signaling in Populus.

item.title: PtoMYC2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.003G092200 Gene Symbol: PtoMYC2b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: Here, we identified and characterized an osmotic stress-induced ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR 15 (PtoERF15) and its target, PtoMYC2b, which was involved in mediating vessel size, density, and cell wall thickness in response to drought in Populus tomentosa.

item.title: SlGLYIII2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g081400 Gene Symbol: SlGLYIII2 Gene Name: glyoxalaseIII2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: A glutathione-independent DJ-1/PfpI domain-containing tomato glyoxalaseIII2, SlGLYIII2, confers enhanced tolerance under salt and osmotic stresses.

item.title: TaASR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS4D02G109500.1 Gene Symbol: TaASR1 Gene Name: Abscisic stress-ripening protein 1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaASR1, a transcription factor gene in wheat, confers drought stress tolerance in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: TaCRY2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaCRY2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Treatment of seedlings with high salt, polyethylene glycol, and abscisic acid (ABA) up-regulated TaCRY2 in roots and germinating embryos.

item.title: TaNHX2-2A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2A02G121000 Gene Symbol: TaNHX2-2A Gene Name: Na+/H+ antiporter 2 Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaSINA2B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2B03G0366300 Gene Symbol: TaSINA2B Gene Name: SINA-type E3 Ub ligase Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaSINA2B, interacting with TaSINA1D, positively regulates drought tolerance and root growth in wheat.

item.title: TaSnRK2.4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS3A02G381100 Gene Symbol: TaSnRK2.4 Gene Name: Triticum aestivum SNF1-type serine-threonine protein kinase Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaSnRK2.
